content:
bad blood spilled all over the floor of Rob Gym on Wednesday night and the UCSB mens volleyball team took its hated rival USC to the woodshed making sure there was no trace of life left PERIOD

The Gauchos   in the Mountain Pacific Sports Federation rolled up their sleeves and swept the Trojans in just an hour and  minutes by a score of    PERIOD The win ensures Santa Barbara a playoff birth in the MPSF Tournament PERIOD UCSB has not made the playoffs the past three seasons PERIOD UCSB was giddy after the sweep PERIOD

We knew that if we won this match that we would be in the playoffs so it was enough of an incentive for us to win freshman middle blocker Michael Kennedy said PERIOD All we need is five straight wins after that and we have a championship ring. winning its last two matches at Rob Gym Santa Barbara increased its season record at home to an astounding  mark PERIOD

Looking extremely confident in the opening game Santa Barbara stretched a midgame close affair into a sevenpoint pounding PERIOD In the second game the Trojans never led PERIOD Kennedy lobbed the ball from the service line with surprising success making the floaters look like butterflies to the Trojan soft defense PERIOD The game remained close in the third game until matchpoint when  faithful fans at Rob Gym rose to their feet and simultaneously clapped to the beat of victory PERIOD

Were getting on a roll UCSB Head Coach Ken Preston said PERIOD Right now we just want to get better and better over the next three matches. after running a majority of its plays at senior opposite Ben Koski for much of the time during its trip to Provo last week UCSB came out looking to distribute the wealth of looks PERIOD Five Gauchos finished the match with eight or more kills PERIOD

Koski led the way by nailing  home PERIOD Sophomore middle blocker Justin Adams and senior outside hitter Andy Rivera added nine kills to the squads 50kill total PERIOD Kennedy and junior outside hitter Jan Carlo Zegarra added eight each and hit . and . respectively PERIOD

Zegarra also helped lead the way by posting nine matchhigh digs to help UCSBs defense PERIOD Santa Barbara outblocked the Trojans . and forced  more hitting errors by the kids from Los Angeles PERIOD The Gauchos hit . on the evening and allowed just a . hitting percentage by USC PERIOD

With last nights win the Gauchos evened the lifetime season record between the two schools while waving goodbye to USC senior outside hitter and Santa Barbara native Brook Billings for the last time PERIOD Billings paced the Trojans with  kills but he hit just . percent PERIOD Senior opposite Beau Rawi added  kills and hit a consistent . for his side of the net PERIOD

UCSB will host No PERIOD  Pepperdine on Saturday at  p.m PERIOD The Waves are riding high on a ninematch winning streak extending its overall record to  and its MPSF record to  PERIOD The Gauchos will have to stop freshman outside hitter Sean Rooney from catching fire PERIOD Rooney was recently recognized as the MPSF Player of the Week PERIOD The Waves defeated then No PERIOD  UCLA on March  PERIOD

Theyre really a fine team Preston said PERIOD What we have to do is play really loose and not worry. print

Comments are closed PERIOD

Forgetting to take off the ratty AF1s at the potluck most Asian households dont take kindly to shoes in the house

Wearing your only red tshirt to every final Red is a lucky color in many cultures especially Chinese cultures

Putting spiders in your friends wedding dress for good luck Has its origins in old english folklore and represents abundance for the couple

Accidentally summoned a ghost by leaving their chopsticks straight up A superstition that has Chinese origins because the chopsticks are reminiscent of funeral incense

Didnt like your friends significant other so they gifted them an umbrella The word for umbrella san sounds like the word for divorce in Chinese

Believing in horoscopes The modern western zodiac actually came from Babylonian astrology

Walked backwards in Portugal to live out the Faust fantasy In Portugal walking backwards allows the devil to know exactly where you are

Stole a raven from the tower of london as reparations According to UK superstition if there arent  ravens in the tower the kingdom will fall

Breaks a knuckle knocking on wood for good scores on finals Knocking on wood may have originated from the Celts and their love for tree spirits

Drunkenly rearranging their apartment for the feng shui at  AM A Chinese cultural practice that harmonizes a person with the energies of the environment around them

Left out their middle name on their taxes because the Fae run the IRS Giving the Fae your full name gives them power over you and the IRS has too much

Hit by a car but the license plate had an angel number Beyond just blowing up on TikTok angel numbers were invented by.. PERIOD Pythagoras
title: UCSB Wins, Exposes Trojans | The Daily Nexus
name: University of California Santa Barbara
